author: Clint Schutte

review: Pros:Very portable. We are able to easily move the Fire TV stick from our bedroom, to our weight room (for use while running on the treadmill), on vacation, etc.Access to key apps including Netflix, Pandora, Hulu, and PBS.Price: this is less than half the cost of Apple TV. If your family hasn't gone all in on Apple, this is an excellent option. The Fire TV stick performs on par with my Apple TV.Cons:Would love to have an IOS compatible remote that I can control from my iPhone. I understand this may be coming in the near future.Would love to have expanded access to TV and Movies - in particular documentaries.Would love to be able to mirror devices that operate on Microsoft and Apple platforms.
